sections.purpose: To dry stained or fixed slides uniformly at controlled temperature.
sections.scope: Applicable to smear preparation and staining workflows in Microbiology.
procedure: Switch ON the slide dryer and set the desired drying temperature.
Allow the unit to preheat to the set temperature.
Place freshly prepared or stained slides on the dryer tray.
Arrange slides so that they do not overlap.
Dry for the required time as per staining protocol.
Remove slides carefully once dry and switch OFF the unit.
precautions: Do not exceed recommended temperatures to avoid damaging samples.
Handle hot slides with forceps to prevent burns.
Keep flammable mounting media away from hot surfaces.
Ensure the dryer is on a stable, heat-resistant surface.
